definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dream (NH id.; Aram. h.lam, [[חֲלַם]]; Eth. h.alama: Ar. h.alama, dream, experience an emission of the seminal fluid, attain to puberty)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of ordinary dreams of sleep Is 29:8, Is 29:8, Ps 126:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of dreams with prophetic meaning: of Jacob Ge 28:12, Joseph Ge 37:5, Ge 37:6, Ge 37:9, Ge 37:9, Ge 37:10, Ge 42:9, of Pharaoh and his servants Ge 40:5, Ge 40:8, Ge 41:1, Ge 41:5, Ge 41:11, Ge 41:11, Ge 41:15 (all E, not elsewh. in Hex.); of Midianite Ju Jdg 7:13, Nebuchad. Da 2:1, Da 2:3, old men in latter days Joe 3:1.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of dreams of false prophets De 13:2, De 13:4, De 13:6, Je 23:25, Je 23:25.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt, [[מַחְלְמִים]] dream (of false prophets, c. acc. cogn.) Je 29:8 (but rd. [[חׂלְמִים]] [[[מ]] by dittogr. fr. [[אַתֶּם]]], Hi Gf Gie Gr).
